select u.user_id user_user_id,u.nick_name user_nick_name,u.user_pic user_user_pic, u2.user_id toReplyUser_user_id,u2.nick_name toReplyUser_nick_name,u2.user_pic toReplyUser_user_pic, u3.user_id commentUser_user_id,u3.nick_name commentUser_nick_name,u3.user_pic commentUser_user_pic, r.update_time update_time,r.reply_content reply_content,r.comment_id comment_id, r.reply_id reply_id,r.to_reply_id to_reply_id from (select * from comment_reply where comment_reply.comment_id = #{commentId}) r inner join user u on r.user_id=u.user_id inner join (select user_id from comment where comment.comment_id=#{commentId}) c inner join user u3 on c.user_id=u3.user_id left join comment_reply r2 on r.to_reply_id=r2.reply_id left join user u2 on r2.user_id=u2.user_id order by r.update_time desc limit #{startRow},#{size}
